sub_title: Business Planning Analyst at Sandoz Novartis
summary: Finance professional with experience in the pharmaceutical industry. Proficient in business partnering, reporting, forecasting and cost controlling. Curious and eager to drive growth through value added analysis. Fluent in English, French and Spanish, learning Dutch.
